entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
